Title: Smallville
Actors: Tom Welling, Allison Mack, Kristin Kreuk, Michael Rosenbaum
Plot: A young Clark Kent struggles to find his place in the world as he learns to harness his alien powers for good and deals with the typical troubles of teenage life in Smallville.
Awards: Won 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 31 wins & 148 nominations.
